name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with over 13 years of experience in cloud-native deployment and automation, specializing in **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **CI/CD** practices. Proficient in **Python** and **Go** programming, demonstrating a strong ability to streamline operations and improve infrastructure efficiency. Expertise in implementing GitOps strategies to enhance deployment processes, ensuring seamless integration and delivery.

Skilled in building high-performance applications across diverse sectors, including healthcare and finance, with a solid understanding of compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven track record in developing AI/ML-powered solutions, leveraging technologies like **FastAPI** and orchestrating workflows using **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Well-versed in site reliability engineering (SRE) principles, aiming to enhance system reliability and automation.
